EmailTemplate.name: QB Plus + Enhanced Payroll
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll Information Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear --,
Thank you for taking the time to discuss your payroll needs with me. I’m happy that I could introduce you to QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll and provide you with valuable information.
Feel free to call me at 800-920-4227 ext. XXXX if you have any questions.
QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll is an excellent choice for managing all your accounting and payroll needs in one place. With QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll, you can set up in minutes, run payroll in 3 simple steps, and easily file your payroll taxes – all from QuickBooks. Confidently run payroll right inside of QuickBooks.
QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll:
Track income and expenses Create estimates and invoices Sync bank accounts1 and apps Manage and pay bills Instant sales and profit reports Track inventory (only with Plus) Prepare and print 1099s (only with Plus) Run payroll in minutes: Just enter hours and we handle all the calculations. Expert support: Call or chat for free support from payroll experts. Taxes done right: Payroll taxes calculated and forms pre-filled so you can file and pay with a few clicks (federal and state).2 Built inside QuickBooks: Payroll data flows directly to your books, can easily be shared with you accountant and works with your favorite apps.
QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll Introductory Pricing:
Free 30 day trial: Try QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll for free for 30 days. Then save 20% and pay only $63.16 per month plus $1.50 per employee per month for 12 months; $78.95 per month plus $1.50 per employee per month after 12 months. Buy Now to Save 50%: Buy QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll and save 50% and pay $39.47 per month plus $1.50 per employee per month for 12 months with no trial; $78.95 per month plus $1.50 per employee per month after 12 months. Great value: Unlimited payrolls and free direct deposit and W2s.
Please click to watch and learn more about QuickBooks Enhanced Payroll.
Thank you for taking the time to review QuickBooks Plus with Enhanced Payroll. If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to contact me. I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Regards,
Telesales Agent
Phone: 888-920-4227 Ext. XXXX
Email Address:
Intuit | Simplify the business of life
Monday thru Friday 8:00 AM PDT to 4:30 PM PST
TRIAL OFFER: First thirty (30) days of subscription to QuickBooks Online Plus with Payroll, starting from the date of enrollment, is free. After the first 30 days, you will receive a 20% discount on your monthly service fees for the first 12 months of service, followed by the then-current monthly rate. Your account will automatically be charged on a monthly basis until you cancel. Each employee you pay is an additional $1.50/month. Pay up to 150 employees. If you file taxes in more than one state, each additional state is $12.00/month. The 20% discount does not apply to additional employees and state tax filing fees. Offer is valid for new QuickBooks Online with Payroll customers only and is available for a limited time. Offer cannot be combined with any other QuickBooks Online or Payroll offers. No limit on the number of subscriptions ordered. If you add or remove services, your service fees will be adjusted accordingly. Sales tax may be applied where applicable. A valid credit card is required to continue using QuickBooks Online with Payroll. You may cancel the service at any time by calling 866-272-8734 x111. Terms, conditions, pricing, special features, and service and support options subject to change without notice.
BUY NOW OFFER: 50% off QuickBooks Online Plus with Payroll for the first 12 months of service, starting from date of enrollment, followed by the then-current monthly rate. Your account will automatically be charged on a monthly basis until you cancel. Each employee you pay is an additional $1.50/month. Pay up to 150 employees. If you file taxes in more than one state, each additional state is $12.00/month. The 50% discount does not apply to additional employees and state tax filing fees. To get 50% off you must select the Buy Now option. Offer not applicable with free trial. Offer valid for new QuickBooks Online customers only, during the promotional period. Promotional period starts March 9, 2015 and is available for a limited time only. Offer cannot be combined with any other QuickBooks Online or Payroll offers. No limit on the number of subscriptions ordered. If you add or remove services, your service fees will be adjusted accordingly. Sales tax may be applied where applicable. A valid credit card is required to continue using QuickBooks Online with Payroll. You may cancel the service at any time by calling 866-272-8734 x111. Terms, conditions, pricing, special features, and service and support options subject to change without notice.
1 Online services vary by participating financial institutions or other parties and may be subject to application approval, additional terms, conditions, and fees. 2 E-File & Pay is available for federal and most state forms and taxes. Check availability at www.payroll.com/onlinefileandpay. You may need to register with tax agencies in order to use E-File & Pay.
